test_script.hook: Spending 3 hours a day on social media?
test_script.script:
You're spending 3 hours a day on social media... and your business is suffering for it.

What if AI could do ALL of it?

SocialSync Empire by DropFly - the world's first TRUE 10/10 automation platform.

AI writes your scripts, creates videos, and posts to all platforms.

Completely hands-free. Zero manual work.

Reclaim your 20 hours this week.
